name: index
contents:
This is a WIP system for tabletop roleplaying games. It should be recognizable to those familiar with popular games involving dragons and/or dungeons, but has different design goals.

It is fundamentally based on the [d20 system](https://www.d20srd.org/index.htm), but changes quite a bit, including:
- Classless design
- Combat rebalanced away from old "13 encounters" slog
- More power sources represented


# Quick Start
To generate a character:
- Determine level
- Generate [Ability Scores](/system8/Basics)
- Select [Feats](/system8/Feats) (1 feat per level)
- Select [Powers](/system8/Powers) (per feat selection)
- Check out [Gear](/system8/Gear)
